Posts.Content: Hi there I am new to the group but hope someone can help ,was taking tamoxifen for 2 years with hot flushes every hour so my oncologist changed me to anastrozole ,I have been taking these for z4 months now ,I have accupuncture every month and also take starflower oil which is supposed to ease the flushes,the flushes have improved only slightly but I now have pain in my joints as we'll . It feels like this nightmare just gets worse. Any advice please.
Posts.Title: Anastrozole
